Package arena

Defines the runtime of the system, allowing the robots battle over the 4 weathers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action  
    Map  
    Robot
    Robot
    Function with the general characteristics of a robot, providing the weakest and most general type to the player.
    RobotList
    Auxiliar class RobotList
    Impelments a list to be used within the World to control the arena.

    World

Package arena Description

Defines the runtime of the system, allowing the robots battle over the 4 weathers.
